scripts.sass: find  \( -path "*/ui-sources/*" -name "styles.scss" -o -path "*/ui-sources/components/*" -name "*.scss" \) | sort -nr | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | sass --stdin app/webroot/css/styles.css -s compressed --no-source-map -I ui-sources/base-sass --trace --no-quiet
scripts.sass-watch: find  \( -path "*/ui-sources/*" -name "styles.scss" -o -path "*/ui-sources/components/*" -name "*.scss" \) | sort -nr | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | sass --stdin app/webroot/css/styles.css -s compressed --no-source-map -I ui-sources/base-sass --watch
scripts.uglify: find \( -path "*/ui-sources/libs/*" -name "dumbo.js" -o -path "*/ui-sources/components/*" -name "*.js" ! -name "*.spec.js" \) | xargs -I{} sh -c "cat {}; echo ''" | terser -o app/webroot/js/dmb-components.min.js & npm run build-spec
scripts.build: npm run lint & npm run sass & npm run uglify & npm run test
